attributes.action: Make the MOD agree to fund FULL rehabilitation of ALL injured service personnel
attributes.additional_details: We want the Ministry of Defence to agree to fund the FULL rehabilitation of ALL UK armed forces personnel who are injured whilst on duty whether it is minor injury or major trauma including limb loss and spinal or neurological damage. This applies to ALL individuals who are injured whilst serving in the Royal Navy, Army or Royal Air Force, whether medically discharged or still serving.
